Name: Log to a Splunk Event Collector
Description: A step template that logs a given message to the Splunk [Event Collector](http://dev.splunk.com/view/event-collector/SP-CAAAE6M) along with related Octopus Deploy variables.
Author: alfhenrik

Parameters.Name: SplunkHost
Parameters.Label: The host endpoint of the Splunk Event Collector

Parameters.Name: SplunkEventCollectorPort
Parameters.Label: The port of the Event Collector

Parameters.Name: SplunkEventCollectorToken
Parameters.Label: The token for the Event Collector

Parameters.Name: Message
Parameters.Label: The message to send to the event collector
